name: Take it!
description:
Take it! a simple video game made in Godot Engine 4.0, where the aim is to collect the coins that drop from the sky.

If the coins hit the ground, they're as good as lost. So pay attention and fill your pouch. You'll know when it's full.

Take it! was inspired by a YouTube video made by Emeral and it's more of an experimentation project than an actual finished game.

You control the character using the left and right arrow keys.
The FPS counter can be toggled using the END key and the game can be made full screen by pressing the HOME key.

Enjoy!

And let me know if you managed to fill the coin pouch!
